packages.title: Puri Beach & Jagannath Temple Tour
packages.description: Visit the sacred Jagannath Temple, explore Puri beaches, and enjoy a peaceful coastal getaway.

packages.title: Araku Valley Nature Retreat
packages.description: Experience coffee plantations, Borra Caves, waterfalls, and scenic green valleys.

packages.title: Gangtok Himalayan Experience
packages.description: Discover serene monasteries, snow-capped mountains, and the famous Tsomgo Lake.

packages.title: Manali Adventure Trip
packages.description: Enjoy trekking, river rafting, snow activities, and breathtaking Himalayan views.

packages.title: Udaipur Royal Heritage Tour
packages.description: Explore palaces, lakes, and the vibrant Rajasthani culture in the City of Lakes.

packages.title: Delhi Historical City Exploration
packages.description: Visit India Gate, Red Fort, Qutub Minar, and enjoy delicious street food in the capital city.
